alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 11 at 9:46PM EST until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise affecting Muhlenberg County. .Water levels along the Green River are forecast to rise again, with Paradise returning to minor flooding by early next week. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 380.0 feet, Water rises over the skimmer wall at the TVA fossil plant. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CST Friday the stage was 378.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Monday morning and continue rising to 380.7 feet Tuesday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
